scripts.dev: concurrently -n ui,desktop "npm run -w apps/ui dev" "npm run -w apps/desktop dev"
scripts.build: npm run -w apps/ui build && npm run -w apps/desktop build
scripts.build:mac: npm run -w apps/ui build && npm run -w apps/desktop build:mac
scripts.build:win: npm run -w apps/ui build && npm run -w apps/desktop build:win
scripts.build:linux: npm run -w apps/ui build && npm run -w apps/desktop build:linux
scripts.dist: npm run -w apps/ui build && npm run -w apps/desktop dist
scripts.lint: npm run -w apps/ui lint && npm run -w apps/desktop lint
